snippet.title: Mr. Saitou Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: From the creator of Rakuen, I'm happy to premiere the first-ever trailer for Mr. Saitou! "Mr. Saitou is an average worker who struggles to find meaning. After an accident, he is spirited away to a fantasy world where an unexpected friend takes him on a life-changing adventure." https://store.steampowered.com/app/628740/Mr_Saitou/ #indiegames #gaming #cozygames
